content: CFS-T EX anchor plate sets Anchor plate sets to secure cable modules within a transit frame in potentially explosive atmospheres ### Categories: Home > Products > Firestop & fire protection > Accessories for firestop & fire protection- ### FEATURES:Features Sealing against static and dynamic pressure Easier installation of modules and insertion of the wedge seal Anchor plates available in galvanized steel, stainless steel grade 1.4301 (AISI 304) or aluminum Fixing anchor plates available in galvanized steel or stainless steel grade 1.4301 (AISI 304) Applications For use in potentially explosive atmospheres Industries affected by the ATEX directive, such as the petrochemical and chemical industries Oil and gas platforms which are not covered by the IMO resolution For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Temperature resistance range: -4 - 167 °F Technical Data | Temperature resistance range | -4 - 167 °F ### ITEMS- 2235280 - Anchor plate CFS-T AP 120 EX GS - Package Size 5 pc Package Contents: - 1x CFS-T FAP EX S/S Anchor plate assy - 2042716 - Anchor plate CFS-T AP 120 EX S/S assy - Package Size 1 pc
